summary: Tested filtering functionality and Coach Dashboard 'Identité de l'application' section. All features working correctly: Shop filter hides sessions, Cours filter hides shop, Tout filter shows all. Coach Dashboard has appName and logoUrl fields that persist to database and dynamically update the site title.

minor.issue: logoUrl field contains HTML code instead of just URL (appears to be user input error, not a bug)

passed_tests: Navigation bar with 3 filter icons (Tout, Cours, Shop) is present and functional
Filter 'Shop' completely hides sessions section - only products visible
Filter 'Cours' hides products section and shows sessions
Filter 'Tout' shows both sessions and products sections
Event Poster popup can be closed with X button
Coach login modal appears on triple-click of '© Afroboost 2026'
Coach login with coach@afroboost.com / afroboost123 works
'Identité de l'application' section present in Concept & Visuel tab
'Nom de l'application' input field (data-testid='concept-app-name') present and editable
Logo preview displays when logoUrl is configured
appName changes are persisted to database via PUT /api/concept
Site title dynamically uses concept.appName value
Product variant selectors (TAILLE/Size, COULEUR/Color) work for 'shoes' product
Shop section text is white (#ffffff) and font-weight 300 (fine)
Sessions scrollbar has pink color (#D91CD2 / rgb(217, 28, 210))
critical_code_review_comments: Filtering logic in App.js (lines 2894-2914, 3018, 3069) correctly implements: activeFilter !== 'shop' hides sessions, activeFilter === 'shop' || 'all' shows products
CoachDashboard.js has 'Identité de l'application' section (lines 1477-1519) with appName and logoUrl fields
App.js uses concept.appName for the main title (line 2960 area)
Sessions scrollbar CSS in App.css uses #D91CD2 pink color

test_credentials.coach_access: Triple click on '© Afroboost 2026' copyright text at bottom of page

seed_data_creation: None - used existing data. Note: appName was temporarily changed to 'Test App Name' during testing and restored to 'Afroboost'
context_for_next_testing_agent: All filtering and Coach Dashboard identity features tested and working. Filter icons are small (26px) circular buttons below search bar. Shop filter completely removes sessions section from DOM. Coach Dashboard 'Concept & Visuel' tab has 'Identité de l'application' section with appName and logoUrl fields. Product variants (size/color) work for products with variants configured. Sessions scrollbar is pink (#D91CD2).
